      void create(java.lang.String cinemaCode, Movie movie, java.time.LocalDateTime sessionDateTime)
      CREATE a new Session and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Session object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Session object will be written to a new file and saved

    • Method Detail

      • getCinemasController

        public CinemasController getCinemasController()
        Gets the Cinema Controller that this controller is referencing
        Returns:
        CinemasController This controller's Cinema Controller

      • setCinemasController

        public void setCinemasController(CinemasController cinemasCtrl)
        Change the Cinema Controller that this controller is referencing
        Parameters:
        cinemasCtrl - This controller's Cinema Controller

      • create

        public void create(java.lang.String cinemaCode,
                   Movie movie,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime sessionDateTime)
        CREATE a new Session and add it into the database file Attributes are validated before creation If attributes are not allowed, throw error and do nothing If Database file exist, existing records are read and new Session object is aopended before saving If Database file does not exist, Session object will be written to a new file and saved
        Parameters:
        cinemaCode - This Sessions's cinema code
        movie - This Sessions's movie
        sessionDateTime - This Sessions's date and time

      • read

        public java.util.ArrayList<Session> read()
        READ and return every Cinema in the Database file
        Returns:
        Model.Session Return list of Sessions if found, else empty list

      • readByAttributes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Session> readByAttributes(int col,
                                                     java.lang.Object valueToSearch)
        READ and return every Session based on a certain value of a given attribute in the Database file
        Parameters:
        col - Given attribute to be check for (based on constant as defined)
        valueToSearch - Value of given attribute to search for
        Returns:
        Model.Session Return list of Sessions if any, else empty list

      • readByAttributes

        public java.util.ArrayList<Session> readByAttributes(java.lang.String cinemaCode,
                                                     java.time.LocalDate sessionDate)
        READ and return every Session of a cinema on a speficic date in the Database file
        Parameters:
        cinemaCode - Cinema's code to be check for
        sessionDate - Value of date to search for
        Returns:
        Model.Session Return list of Sessions if any, else empty list

      • readBySession

        public Session readBySession(java.lang.String cinemaCode,
                             java.time.LocalDateTime sessionDateTime)
        READ and return a session of a given cinema on a specific date and time in the Database file
        Parameters:
        cinemaCode - Cinema's code to be check for
        sessionDateTime - Value of date and time to search for
        Returns:
        Session Return Session if found, else null object

      • readById

        public Session readById(int id)
        READ and return a session of a given session ID in the Database file
        Parameters:
        id - Session's ID to check for
        Returns:
        Session Return Session if found, else null object

      • updateByAttribute

        public void updateByAttribute(int col,
                              java.lang.String cinemaCode,
                              java.lang.Object oldValue,
                              java.lang.Object newValue)
        UPDATE a Session's with new value based on a given attribute and cinema code in Database file
        Parameters:
        col - Given attribute to be check for (based on constant as defined)
        cinemaCode - Code of cinema to be updated
        oldValue - Value of given attribute to search for
        newValue - New value of session's attribute

                       int id,

        Parameters:

        id - Session's ID to check for
        newValue - New value of session's attribute

      • updateSeatsAvailability

        public void updateSeatsAvailability(int id,
                                    SeatingPlan newSeatsAvailabiity)
        UPDATE a Session's seats availability of a given session ID in Database file
        Parameters:
        id - Session's ID to check for
        newSeatsAvailabiity - New value of session's seats availability

      • updateByMovie

        public void updateByMovie(int col,
                          int movieID,
                          java.lang.Object newValue)
        UPDATE a Movie's attribute in Session with matching movieID Database file
        Parameters:
        col - Attribute of movie to update
        movieID - ID of Movie to search for
        newValue - New value of Movie's attribute

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String cinemaCode,
                   java.time.LocalDateTime sessionDateTime)
        Delete a Session in the Database file, based on the cinema code and datetime attribute passed
        Parameters:
        cinemaCode - Code of cinema which will be deleted
        sessionDateTime - Date and time of session which will be deleted

      • delete

        public void delete(int id)
        Delete a Session in the Database file, based on the session ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID of session which will be deleted

      • deleteByMovie

        public void deleteByMovie(int movieID)
        Delete Sessions in the Database file with a specific MovieID
        Parameters:
        movieID - Sessions with this MovieID will be deleted

      • getLastId

        public int getLastId()
        Return the ID of the last Movie in the Database field
        Returns:
        int ID of last Movie in the Database

      • assignSeat

        public boolean assignSeat(SeatingPlan seatingPlan,
                          int seatId,
                          int sessionId)
        Mark a seat of a session as occupied, based on the seat id and session ID
        Parameters:
        seatingPlan - Seating Plan of the session
        seatId - Seat ID to be marked as occupied
        sessionId - Session ID in which the seat will be marked occupied
        Returns:
        boolean Return true if seat has been marked occupied Return false if seat was already marked occupied prior to this
